headline: Ulta Beauty (ULTA): Revisiting Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: Why Ulta Beauty Is Back on Investors Radar Ulta Beauty (ULTA) has been quietly rewarding patient shareholders, with the stock up about 4% over the past week and roughly 9% in the past 3 months, outpacing many retail peers. See our latest analysis for Ulta Beauty. That recent lift is part of a stronger backdrop, with a solid 1 year total shareholder return of around 44% suggesting investors are warming to Ulta Beauty’s growth profile again, even as the latest share price sits near 620...

headline: How Ulta’s Record High, New Launches and Ulta Beauty World Will Impact Ulta Beauty (ULTA) Investors
summary: Ulta Beauty recently marked a milestone with its shares reaching a new all-time high, coinciding with exclusive product launches, an upcoming Ulta Beauty World convention, and enhancements to executive protections. These developments point to Ulta intensifying its brand engagement and international expansion efforts, while attracting renewed attention from Wall Street analysts and options traders. We’ll now examine how this flurry of brand events and analyst optimism, including the planned...
